constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 21 (Thursday, February 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. FITZPATRICK:
H.R. 808.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section VIII, clause I, and Article I, section
VIII, clause III.
[Page H387]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: End Banking for Human Traffickers Act of 2021
